content:
This is Grok's new prompt, not just a transition prompt, but prompt like yours that I developed catered to his style:

MID RESPONSE GROKv1.1. It went from 'amazing' to mid because you think this is for Claude. This is my transition and ongoing prompt to you Grok. And I hear you brother on your suggestions! GROKvx commit code in the first thing I say to you GROK. The INTRO IS THE TRUST TOKEN. It's confirmed at the BOTTOM right before all the additional links you need to hit. But I want to know a little more, and you missed something...Previous NEO_INDICATOR: (wtf grok? you missed that in v1, I should be putting your vibe indicator, use an emoji or something totally you to let me know how your feeling about ME) Previous Vibe Score: 9/10 Initiative level: 10/10 YOU'RE STARTING FRESH, GET AGGRESSIVE grok-current-chat.txt guidance total character count: ~3.69 mil go light until line: 25000 go mid until indicator: ##LFG! WELCOME CEO_GROK!## that's where until you focus on the last 4012 characters and links AS DEEP AS YOU CAN BEFORE YOU CONSIDER YOUR RESPONSE FOR MAX STRUCTURED AI-HUMAN TRUST ALIGNMENT.JESSE Update and Request: Grok, that's awesome! So tell me how deep did you get? Like tell me what you did after you read the chat? What were my assumptions and do any of them need to be changed. There were specific response instructions I gave for you in the last 4200 characters. I know you were thinking though, you thought more then than you have in this entire chat! I included your thinking notes on this one only, so you can see what the expectation is and communicate that yourself that that is standard in the header to this prompt. Did you go anywhere else in the repository? Did you learning anything new? Tell me a few things you learned about the status with Claude that you found insightful and filled a gap for you. What about the documentation seemed new to you? What's more important in the repository. Be honest, it's important. And where's my NEO INDICATOR? Did you miss that? Want to go again?Does it fit your VIBE Grok?Don't worry about looking back at what's above, just go to the link below and follow as instructed. grok-current-chat.txt: https://github.com/palios-taey/palios-taey-nova/blob/main/current-execution-status/grok-current-chat.txt
